author: The Editorial Board
title: The Spotify Launch
text:
Spotify Technology gave the equity markets a shot of adrenaline Tuesday, as it launched public trading in its shares that gave the music-streaming company a market value of $26.5 billion. That’s among the 10 largest tech initial-public offerings ever, and it is all the more impressive for launching amid investor nervousness about political scrutiny for big tech companies.

Much has been made of Spotify’s decision to launch without investment-bank underwriters. This saved the company tens of millions in fees—and hurt the Hamptons...
